summary: Water quality is stable but pH is slightly below optimal range for tilapia.

insights.recommendation: Monitor closely; consider adjusting pH to 7.2-7.6 for optimal tilapia health.
Maintain TDS below 500 ppm; consider water changes if TDS continues to rise.
Ensure temperature remains between 24-30°C for optimal growth of tilapia and plants.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.034 / 7.016 / 7.088 (trend: down)
• TDS avg/min/max: 321.452 / 300.3 / 331.4 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 25.83 / 23.56 / 30.44 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
